program

Class Truck

  • java.lang.Object
    • program.Truck
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OrdinaryTruck, RefrigratedTruck

    public abstract class Truck
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides a skeletal implementation for the truck to minimize effort require to implement it in the refrigerated truck and ordinary truck
    Author:
    Radhimas Djana

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract int addItemExtraItem(Item cargoItem, int extraCargo)
      This method will be used if there is an item that doesn't fit the cargo (ergo why it named extra item), it have the sameway with addItemOptimizeManifest but rather than using a reorder amount to put it to a truck it uses the extra item because it is the left over from the reorder amount.
      abstract void addItemImportManifest(java.lang.String itemName, java.lang.Integer quantity)
      This method will be used when adding an item in a import manifest the way it work, it will scan the csv file then based on that it will check if its ordinary or refrigrated then add a new truck based on what's written in the quantity,more detail are inside of the method where
      abstract int addItemOptimizeManifest(Item item)
      This method will be used when adding an item to a truck in generate manifest where it will add item to a truck based on which truck is empty, and it prioritize a refrigrated truck if there's a leftover item.

      abstract boolean isCargoFull()
      check if a cargo is full by checking if it reached their maximum capacity where in refrigrated truck is 800 while in the ordinary truck is 1000

      set the extra item where extra items are an item that get leftover when adding an item in optimize manifest because its more than the size of a truck

      • addItemImportManifest

        public abstract void addItemImportManifest(java.lang.String itemName,
                                           java.lang.Integer quantity)
        This method will be used when adding an item in a import manifest the way it work, it will scan the csv file then based on that it will check if its ordinary or refrigrated then add a new truck based on what's written in the quantity,more detail are inside of the method where
        Parameters:
        itemName -
        quantity - the quantity here is the item

      • addItemOptimizeManifest

        public abstract int addItemOptimizeManifest(Item item)
        This method will be used when adding an item to a truck in generate manifest where it will add item to a truck based on which truck is empty, and it prioritize a refrigrated truck if there's a leftover item. More detail are inside of the method
        Parameters:
        item - the item that going to be filled to the cargo
        Returns:

      • addItemExtraItem

        public abstract int addItemExtraItem(Item cargoItem,
                                     int extraCargo)
        This method will be used if there is an item that doesn't fit the cargo (ergo why it named extra item), it have the sameway with addItemOptimizeManifest but rather than using a reorder amount to put it to a truck it uses the extra item because it is the left over from the reorder amount. More detail are inside of the method
        Parameters:
        cargoItem - the item that going to be filled to the cargo
        extraCargo - indicate how many item is more than the capacity of a truck
        Returns:

      • isCargoFull

        public abstract boolean isCargoFull()
        check if a cargo is full by checking if it reached their maximum capacity where in refrigrated truck is 800 while in the ordinary truck is 1000
        Returns:
        true if, full false if not
